result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.SetUp (edit)
com.magneticreason.fitnium.BaseFitniumFixture

Set up the browser and connect to selenium

The server is located at localhost
The server is on port 4444
Using the browser *chrome start at http://localhost:8090/fitnium/
check is selenium initialised true
set speed to 100 milliseconds
set timeout to 20000 milliseconds
write to debug starting test

Lets first start at the Fitnium home page at Magnetic Reason

starting at URL testpage4api.html

wait for page to load for 5 seconds

check title of current page Magnetic Reason
check text of element xpath=//h1 Fitnium Test Page

check is Text Present This page contains all the elements neccassary to test Fitnium true

List Wait APIs

Wait for a list to have anything selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have something selected  |

Wait for a list to have a specific id selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected id | id |

Wait for a list to have a specific index selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected index | index |

Wait for a list to have a specific label selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected label | label |

Wait for a list to have a specific value selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected value | value |

Wait for a list to have a specific set of ids selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected ids | id-list |

Wait for a list to have a specific set of indexes selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected indexes | index-list |

Wait for a list to have a specific set of labels selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected labels | label-list |

Wait for a list to have a specific set of values selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected values | value-list |

Wait for a list to have a specific set of options selected
| wait for listbox | locator | to have selected options | options-list |

!2Examples
click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
select Option England In List id=form_country

wait for listbox id=form_country to have something selected

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
select Option England In List id=form_country

wait for listbox form_country to have selected id eng

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
select Option England In List id=form_country

wait for listbox form_country to have selected index 3

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
select Option England In List id=form_country

wait for listbox form_country to have selected label England

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
select Option England In List id=form_country

wait for listbox form_country to have selected value eng

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
add Selection Option Audi To List form_car
add Selection Option Saab To List form_car

wait for listbox form_car to have selected ids saab,audi

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
add Selection Option Audi To List form_car
add Selection Option Saab To List form_car

wait for listbox form_car to have selected indexes 1,2

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
add Selection Option Audi To List form_car
add Selection Option Saab To List form_car

wait for listbox form_car to have selected labels Saab,Audi

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
add Selection Option Audi To List form_car
add Selection Option Saab To List form_car

wait for listbox form_car to have selected values saab,audi

click the refresh button
wait for page to load for 5 seconds
add Selection Option Audi To List form_car
add Selection Option Saab To List form_car

wait for listbox form_car to have selected options Volvo,Saab,Audi,Mercedes,Other

Expand All | Collapse All
 Tear Down: .FitniumUserGuide.FitGuides.ApiTest.TearDown (edit)

close the browser
